name: @alextheman/eslint-plugin
description: A package to provide custom ESLint rules and configs
author: alextheman

scripts.change-major: npm version major -m "Change version number to v%s"
scripts.change-minor: npm version minor -m "Change version number to v%s"
scripts.change-patch: npm version patch -m "Change version number to v%s"
scripts.create-local-package: npm run build && rm -f alextheman-eslint-plugin-*.tgz && npm pack
scripts.format: npm run build && prettier --write --parser typescript "src/**/*.ts" "tests/**/*.ts" && eslint --fix --suppress-all "src/**/*.ts" "tests/**/*.ts" "package.json" && rm -f eslint-suppressions.json
scripts.lint: npm run build && tsc --noEmit && eslint "src/**/*.ts" "tests/**/*.ts" "package.json" && prettier --check --parser typescript "src/**/*.ts" "tests/**/*.ts"
